meanings.sent1: The castle had a crenelled roof, giving it a strong and fortified appearance.
meanings.sent2: The ancient fortress was crenelled to protect against enemy attacks.
meanings.sent3: The crenelled design of the wall made it look like a miniature castle.
meanings.sent4: Her crenelled hairline resembled the turrets of a medieval castle.
meanings.sent5: The crenelled pattern etched in the stone was a unique architectural feature.

meanings.definition: Provided with crenels or embrasures for defense.
meanings.sent1: The crenelled tower provided a strategic advantage during battles.
meanings.sent2: Soldiers stood behind the crenelled walls, ready to defend the fortress.
meanings.sent3: The crenelled fortifications made the enemy rethink their attack strategy.
meanings.sent4: The crenelled battlements stood like guardians protecting the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The crenelled defenses were crucial in repelling the invaders.

meanings.definition: Having a notched or indented edge.
meanings.sent1: The crenelled edges of the paper gave it a decorative touch.
meanings.sent2: She used scissors to create a crenelled border on the craft project.
meanings.sent3: The crenelled pattern on the fabric added a playful flair to the design.
meanings.sent4: The crenelled outline of the map marked the boundaries of the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The crenelled border on the cake made it look like a work of art.
